item.title: Curriculum vitae
item.description: Short PDF version here Personal information First name Brunetto Marco Last name Ziosi Address via Ivancich n.17, 30174, Chirignago (VE) Telephone (+39) 3474958152 Email brunetto.ziosi@gmail.com Nationality Italian Date of birth 03/05/1985 Position Senior software developer at Pixartprinting - a Cimpress company Website brunettoziosi.eu Public repository https://github.com/brunetto Docker registry https://hub.docker.com/u/brunetto Education & Employment 2018 2018⁄01 Senior software developer at Pixartprinting - a Cimpress company Design, build and ship Go micro-services on AWS.
